00008 namespace Mangle {
00009 namespace Stream {
00010 
00017 class Mangle2OgreStream : public Ogre::DataStream
00018 {
00019   StreamPtr inp;
00020 
00021   void init()
00022     {
00023       // Get the size, if possible
00024       if(inp->hasSize)
00025         mSize = inp->size();
00026 
00027       // Allow writing if inp supports it
00028       if(inp->isWritable)
00029         mAccess |= Ogre::DataStream::WRITE;
00030     }
00031 
00032  public:
00034   Mangle2OgreStream(StreamPtr _inp)
00035     : inp(_inp) { init(); }
00036 
00038   Mangle2OgreStream(const Ogre::String &name, StreamPtr _inp)
00039     : Ogre::DataStream(name), inp(_inp) { init(); }
00040 
00041   // Only implement the DataStream functions we have to implement
00042 
00043   size_t read(void *buf, size_t count)
00044   { return inp->read(buf,count); }
00045 
00046   size_t write(const void *buf, size_t count)
00047   { assert(inp->isWritable); return inp->write(buf,count); }
00048 
00049   void skip(long count)
00050     {
00051       assert(inp->isSeekable && inp->hasPosition);
00052       inp->seek(inp->tell() + count);
00053     }
00054 
00055   void seek(size_t pos)
00056     { assert(inp->isSeekable); inp->seek(pos); }
00057 
00058   size_t tell() const
00059     { assert(inp->hasPosition); return inp->tell(); }
00060 
00061   bool eof() const { return inp->eof(); }
00062 
00064   void close() {}
00065 };
